Dematic - Software Engineer

Dec 2020 - Now

With a focus on embedded systems for warehouses, I have honed my skills in C programming and Linux operations. I have also gained experience in utilizing in-house testing frameworks and following release protocols to ensure high-quality product delivery. My work focuses on specific processes within the warehouse and requires me to have detailed knowledge on these processes and how they interact with other areas of the warehouse. My role also includes regular customer interaction, demonstrating my strong communication and organizational skills.

Northcoders - Trainee Software Engineer

Aug 2020 - Nov 2020

A 14-week intensive coding bootcamp where I was able to develop my coding skills from zero experience to a work-ready full-stack developer. I learned the technologies including JavaScript, Node, and React and was able to apply these skills to real-world projects, showcasing my work-ready abilities
